ca.thurn.jgail.core

Interface AsynchronousAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MonteCarloSearch, NegamaxSearch, UctSearch

    public interface AsynchronousAgent
extends Agent
    An Agent which searches for actions asynchronously.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginAsynchronousSearch(int player, State rootNode)
      Instructs the Agent to kick off an asynchronous action search and then return.
      ActionScore getAsynchronousSearchResult()
      Halts the current asynchronous action search and returns the result.

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.thurn.jgail.core.Agent

        getStateRepresentation, pickActionBlocking

    • Method Detail

      • beginAsynchronousSearch

        void beginAsynchronousSearch(int player,
                           State rootNode)
        Instructs the Agent to kick off an asynchronous action search and then return. This method should not block on completion of the search -- the result will be requested later via getAsynchronousSearchResult.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who this Agent is trying to optimize for.
        rootNode - The current state of the game.

      • getAsynchronousSearchResult

        ActionScore getAsynchronousSearchResult()
        Halts the current asynchronous action search and returns the result. Returning null is allowed to indicate the agent needs more time to find a meaningful result.
        Returns:
        The current best-known action for this agent to take, along with an associated heuristic score, or null if insufficient time has elapsed to find a useful result.
